    • checkCheckers

      public int checkCheckers​(char user)
      Iterates through the checker board counting current users checker count
      Parameters:
      user - current user
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if user has checkers, Returns 0 if user is out and changes winner boolean to true

    • hasJump

      public java.lang.String hasJump​(int i, int j, char user)
      Checks to see whether the checker at selected coordinate has a jump available. Was made but not implemented but could be for a rule where you have to take a jump if there is one.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate of checker
      j - y coordinate of checker
      Returns:
      Returns string "left" "right" or "none" depending on whether there is a jump
